labels.analysis: The MCP Server specializes in managing Twitter Spaces by providing tools to check availability, download, and transcribe audio content. It offers AI-powered transcription with multiple output formats, focusing on streamlining the entire workflow from availability check to final transcript delivery. The tools are designed to handle all aspects of Twitter Spaces management, including listing and retrieving downloaded content.
labels.reasoning: The primary function of the server is clearly related to Twitter Spaces, which are audio conversations on the Twitter platform. As this is a unique use case not specifically covered by predefined categories, a custom label was created. The secondary labels relate to the server's ability to process audio content and manage files.

tools.name: check_space_availability
tools.description: Check if a Twitter Space is available for download

tools.name: download_twitter_space
tools.description: Download a Twitter Space and wait for completion

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for download completion before returning

tools.name: transcribe_space
tools.description: Transcribe a downloaded Twitter Space using AI

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for transcription completion before returning

tools.name: get_transcript
tools.description: Download transcript in various formats (json, txt, paragraphs, timecoded, summary)

tools.name: download_and_transcribe_space
tools.description: Download a Twitter Space and automatically transcribe it

server_info_crawled.overview: Download and transcribe Twitter Spaces effortlessly using AI-powered transcription. Access multiple transcript formats and manage your downloaded spaces with ease. Streamline the complete workflow from availability check to transcription in one integrated solution.

tools.name: check_space_availability
tools.description: Check if a Twitter Space is available for download

tools.name: download_twitter_space
tools.description: Download a Twitter Space and wait for completion

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for download completion before returning

tools.name: transcribe_space
tools.description: Transcribe a downloaded Twitter Space using AI

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for transcription completion before returning

tools.name: download_and_transcribe_space
tools.description: Download a Twitter Space and automatically transcribe it

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@afarhadi99/spaces-download-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
